topic.title: Authors
topic.section:
Authors are able to submit items to a scheduled conference directly through the conference website. Then by logging in the conference website, the Author can track the status of submitted items, and participate in the editorial process.

New users can enroll themselves as an Author on registration to a scheduled conference, and can enroll themselves with other scheduled conferences from their profile page.

For more information, see the {help_topic key="editorial.authorsRole" text="Author's Role page"}.
